ui.about module¶

ui.about.dialog(self)¶

Basic about dialog with version information of the current

ui.action module¶

class ui.action.Action(text, category, aId, parent)¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QAction

A custom QAction class, which allows to set a category for an action (e.g. “Jobs” or “Rendernode”) and a required user role for this action to be accessible.

ui.headerview module¶

class ui.headerview.HeaderView(orientation, parent=None)¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QHeaderView

Extended QHeaderView class allowing columns to be hidden.

applySectionSettings()¶

Applies all section settings: initial section size, intitial resize mode, initial section visibility

sectionHiddenStatus()¶

Reimplement this method returning a list of boolean values indicating each section visibility.

sectionResizeModes()¶

Reimplement this method returning a list of Qt.ResizeModes

sectionSizes()¶

Reimplement this method returning a list of integer section withs

sectionVisibilityToggled(checked)¶

Slot called once a section has been ticked/unticked in the header :param checked: boolean value indicating the visibility :type checked: boolean

setColumnsHidable(value)¶

Set columns to be hideable. :param value: turn this feature on or off by passing True/False :type value: boolean

showHeaderContextMenu(pos)¶

The slot called once the header was right clicked. :param pos: position of the click :type pos: QPoint

ui.logindialog module¶

class ui.logindialog.LoginDialog(parent=None)¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QDialog

accept()¶

Called when clicked on OK or Cancel

ui.logindialog.main()¶
ui.logindialog.userIsValid(username, password)¶

Check if the user is valid. :param username: username to check :type username: str :param password: password to check (unencrypted) :type password: str

ui.mainwindow module¶

class ui.mainwindow.MainWindow¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QMainWindow

addJobPanel()¶

Add a job panel to the main window. All views on the panels share one data model.

addPoolsPanel()¶

Add a pool panel to the main window. All views on the panels share one data model.

addRenderNodePanel()¶

Add a render node panel to the main window. All views on the panels share one data model.

closeEvent(*args, **kwargs)¶

Reimplemented from QMainWindw. Called when the main window closes. Saves the current widget layout and frees resources

editPreferences()¶

Slot called to open the preferences edit dialog.

initActions()¶

Create and setup actions valid in the main window

initMenu()¶

Setup the menu bar with menus and add actions.

initToolbar()¶

Add main toolbar and add actions needed for quick access.

restoreSettings()¶

Restore main window and child widget settings/states.

saveSettings()¶

Save all settings related to the main window. This is not to be confused with actual ‘configuration’ and only stores states of the ui. This method also notifies child widgets to save their settings.

ui.progressbardelegate module¶

class ui.progressbardelegate.ProgressBarDelegate¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QStyledItemDelegate

A delegate able to display the cell value as a progress bar. The cell value needs to be an integer.

paint(painter, option, index)¶

Reimplemented from QStyledItemDelegate.

ui.tableview module¶

class ui.tableview.TableView(parent=None)¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QTableView

Extended QTableView allowing to deselect rows by clicking on empty space and supporting the custom HeaderView.

mousePressEvent(event)¶

Reimplement to make view clearable

rowSelectionChanged¶
setModel(*args, **kwargs)¶

Reimplemented to apply section settings AFTER the model was set. This is the only way to implement this behaviour since the sections are reset when the model is applied the first time.

setSelectionClearable(value)¶

If the clearable selection is activated a user can click on an empty space in the view to deselect the current selection :type value: boolean
